title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A fully responsive e-commerce website built with React and Node.js. Features include user authentication, product filtering, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard.

title: Task Management Application
description: A productivity app for managing tasks and projects with team collaboration features. Includes drag-and-drop interfaces, deadline tracking, and notification system.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather application that provides real-time weather data and forecasts for any location. Features interactive maps, graphs for historical data, and weather alerts.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills. Built with modern web technologies and featuring responsive design, animations, and contact form.

title: Fitness Tracking App
description: A mobile-first web application for tracking workouts, nutrition, and fitness goals. Includes progress visualization, custom workout plans, and social sharing features.
